description: Chewy and delicious gluten-free almond butter cookies sweetened with dates and with only 5 ingredients!
name: Not Just For Passover Recipes - Almond Butter Cookies

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
Soak the dates in hot water for 2-3 minutes.

Squeeze the water out and place them in the food processor. Add the almond butter, 3 tablespoons of almond flour, potato starch and vanilla and process until all the ingredients come together to form a dough ( it should be soft and smooth and slightly sticky, but workable. If it's not, add the additional tablespoon of almond flour and and mix again)

Working with 2 teaspoons a time (we like using a small ice cream scoop), form 15 balls with the dough. Arrange them on the lined baking sheet and flatten them slight with the palm of your hand. Using a fork, do a crisscross pattern on each cookie (this step is optional)
Bake for 8-10 minutes and let them cool completely. Drizzle with melted chocolate (optional)
